income_messages:
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 08:13:04
SUBJECT:   Office Of The Director,
  Office Of The Director,
                                International Remittance Department,
                                    Central Bank Of Nigeria,CBN,
                                      Central Bank Building Zone 2,
                                                Abuja-Nigeria
                                                    4/6/2023
Attention: Honorable Beneficiary,
Subject : Immediate Payment Of Your fund.
Dear Sir / Madam,
I have been directed by The Board Of Directors, Central Bank Of
Nigeria to inform you of the arrival of your fund and our resolve to
remit without further red-tap ism your fund into your nominated Bank
Account as soon as possible.
Please be reminded that after the expiration of 36 hours and we fail
to receive any positive response from you i will have no other option
than to cancel your payment procedures.
We apologize for the delay over the years to remit your fund into your
Bank Account. This has been as a result of bad leadership in our
country.
Thank you ,
Mrs. Cynthia Alejandro,
Foreign Operations Director,
International Remittance Department,
Central Bank Of Nigeria CBN.   
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: xp43500@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 13:29:06
SUBJECT: Re: Office Of The Director,
Sir,
Happy Easter celebrations!
I hereby acknowledge the receipt of your latest mail which refers.
Kindly, send all these items : A copy of your valid Id or copy  of
your International Passport, details of your Contract /Inheritance
funds , a copy of your latest Utility Bill and finally  your secured
Telephone and Fax number  where you can be reached at any short notice
if the need arises.
As soon as i receive all these enumerated items we shall proceed with
the speed of light to make sure that your funds are wired into your
account which will be demanded later as soon as all your other
information has been keyed into our computing system for onward
procedure to activate your payment.
Thank you ,
Dr. Cynthia Alejandro.
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: xp43500@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 16:49:51
SUBJECT: Re: Office Of The Director,
Attention: Mr. Vincent ,
Hmm, i am a bit confused too as to your response to my reply  over
this payment issue .
Your name was published in the Government's  latest Gazette for
payment of Foreign Contractors who executed various contracts with the
Federal Government Of Nigeria, some years back and are scheduled to
receive their payments in the second quarter of this year.
Did you not execute any contract if i may ask? Please, be honest with
me and in any case you did not execute any contract just let me know
so that we can put heads together and come up with better idea.
I am waiting for your response.
My regards,
Dr. Cynthia Alejandro.
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: xp43500@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 18:37:09
SUBJECT: Re: Office Of The Director,
ok
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: xp43500@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-11 05:35:24
SUBJECT: REPLY
Sir,
Without sounding in modest can i propose this to you ?
Apply for this fund release which has already been approved by the out
going President Of Nigeria, Mr. Mohammadu Buhari. GCFR, and i will
push the paper works to all the various Departments that needs to
append their signatures for the release of this fund and as soon as it
is finally approved and ready to be paid i will request for your
banking details where the fund will be paid into and from there you
can share it in this formulae:
You will be taking 60 percent while i take 40 percent and i assure you
that there will be no risk on this transaction.
Thank you,
Ms. Cynthia Alejandro.
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: xp43500@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-11 07:16:23
SUBJECT: Re: REPLY
Yeah, i remember now that it is not a Nigerian originated fund but
that of the UN, based on the monetary largess  given out as
palliatives during the Covid-19 and post Covid-19, era.
So your name was listed as recipient.
Thank you,
Dr. Cynthia Alejandro.
From: c****************7@gmail.com
To: xp43500@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-11 08:18:36
SUBJECT: Re: REPLY
Sir,
I will do as soon as possible.
Thanks,
Cynthia
outbound_messages:
From: xp43500@l******s.email
To: c****************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-09 08:13:08
SUBJECT: Re:   Office Of The Director,
Dear Mrs. Cynthia Alejandro,
Thank you for your email. I am glad to hear that my fund has arrived and that you are willing to remit it into my nominated bank account. I would like to proceed with the process as soon as possible.
Please let me know what information you need from me in order to complete the transfer. I am available to provide any necessary details.
Thank you for your assistance.
Best wishes,
Vincent
From: xp43500@l******s.email
To: c****************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-10 14:12:26
SUBJECT: Re: Office Of The Director,
Dear Dr. Cynthia Alejandro,
Thank you for your email and Happy Easter to you too. I am a bit confused as to what you are referring to. Could you please provide me with more information about the items you are requesting? I am not sure what contract funds you are referring to or what payment you are trying to activate. 
Please provide me with more details so that I can better understand your request and provide you with the necessary information.
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Vincent
From: xp43500@l******s.email
To: c****************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-10 17:12:42
SUBJECT: Re: Office Of The Director,
Dear Dr. Cynthia Alejandro,
I'm sorry, but I have no knowledge of any contract executed with the Federal Government of Nigeria. I have never been involved in any business dealings with Nigeria or its government. I believe you may have contacted the wrong person.
Best wishes,
Vincent
From: xp43500@l******s.email
To: c****************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-10 19:12:23
SUBJECT: Re: Office Of The Director,
Sure, how may I assist you?
Best wishes,
Vincent
From: xp43500@l******s.email
To: c****************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-11 06:12:12
SUBJECT: Re: REPLY
Dear Ms. Cynthia Alejandro,
Thank you for your email. However, I am not interested in any proposal that involves the release of funds from Nigeria. I have heard of many scams that originate from Nigeria and I do not wish to be involved in any illegal or unethical activities. 
I appreciate your offer, but I must decline.
Best wishes,
Vincent
From: xp43500@l******s.email
To: c****************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-11 09:12:15
SUBJECT: Re: REPLY
Dear Sir/Madam,
I apologize, but I am not sure what your message is in reference to. Could you please provide me with more context or information so that I can better understand and respond to your message?
Best wishes,
Vincent
